documents.document: @realDonaldTrump You really need to actually talk to DHS and CBP and let them explain to you what they do every day.

@domesticdeitas He shoots off & deletes like mad. It's pretty scary, really.
@domesticdeitas Also, as to the President, EVERYTHING he communicates is technically a "record" that is supposed to be preserved.
@domesticdeitas or someone would exploit the hell out of it. It's a shit show, and shouldn't be happening.
@domesticdeitas The personal device & unsecured, unrecorded Tweets are a complete security nightmare. I kinda wish some malicious hacker
@domesticdeitas All the ethical rules & regs that apply to employees do not apply in the same way to the President, unfortunately.
@citymom92 Thanks! I love it when they let me out of the office!
@domesticdeitas what you are transmitting via gov't servers & devices & while on gov't property.
@domesticdeitas using gov't computer or server. Or your personsl device if you are at work on gov't property. You just need to be aware of
@domesticdeitas We are prohibited from doing anything partisan with or on gov't property. And zero right of privacy for anything you send
@domesticdeitas that they seem like the views of the agency, or using your position to influence something outside of work.
@domesticdeitas Potentially all communications, in that you want to be careful that you are never holding out your own personal views so

@MegglesP running etc. for awhile. The long term effects are kind of unknown. Anyhow, it is obviously necessary for you!
@MegglesP problems - basically, if you are a runner etc. you should avoid taking it unless absolutely necessary & if you do take it, stop
@MegglesP I had it with me when I studied abroad in Africa in case of some kind of bad infection. But I recently heard about the tendon
@MegglesP I am so sorry. I have been following your saga with this infection. Cipro is no joke.
@erinjaffe Oh my god. Just....yeah. What people go through. <3
@MegglesP Soft tissue is already stretchy from pregnancy, this could exacerbate it. Just something to be aware of. https://t.co/3Qc11hIm0s
@MegglesP You also know about the risks of Cipro & ligament/tendon damage, right? Just something to be aware of, esp. postpartum.
